headline: Is It Time To Reassess Equinix (EQIX) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Equinix at around US$801 per share still offers value, you are not alone. This article will walk through what that price might imply. The stock has had a mixed run, with a 0.1% return over the last week, 5.7% over the last month, 4.9% year to date, but a 12.2% decline over the last year. This can leave investors unsure how to read the longer term picture that includes 18.6% and 20.1% returns over 3 and 5 years respectively. Recent coverage has focused on Equinix...

headline: Equinix Announces Tax Treatment of 2025 Distributions
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company™, today announced the tax treatment for all 2025 distributions on its common stock.
